notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: F.A.-B. and C.B. (Chahrazed Bekhechi) conceived and designed the experiments. C.E.W.M. performed sampling, extractions, antimicrobial and antioxidant activities. C.B. (Clementine Baccati) and C.B. (Chahrazed Bekhechi) performed GC, GC/MS, NMR experiments. F.H. and B.B. performed identification and description of the plant. M.M. and J.M. performed anti-inflammatory activity. M.P. performed statistical analyses. C.B. (Chahrazed Bekhechi), J.M. and F.T. contributed to the preparation of the manuscript.
